page.title: 20PROPOSED PRISON NEAR WHADDON
page.content: The people at Tattenhoe and Whaddon are worried that the proposed site for a prison at Milton Keynes is so near the village. There was a meeting of the Parish Council when the people talked about it. They said that they do not want the village to change. Whaddon and Tattenhoe are rural communities and a prison could make the place different. Traffic through the village could get much worse when the prison is being built and after it is finished. The people of Whaddon and Tattenhoe enjoy living in a friendly rural area, with the amenities of Milton Keynes so near them, and they do not want their way of life to change. Living in this area does mean that you need a car as there is only one bus every Thursday morning to take the people to Bletchley for market day.
